Module scheduler
Package customer

Class CustomerDAOImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • customer.CustomerDAOImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO
    public class CustomerDAOImp
extends Object
implements CustomerDAO
    This the Customer DAO implementation class. It contains the customer DAO data. It sends queries to the DBStatement class to send to the database and stores customer data in return.
    Version:
    1.0, 01/22/21
    Author:
    bdudu

      This method is used when the user adds a new customer using the CustomerEditView.

      This query deletes a customer from the database using a DELETE FROM.

      This method returns a customer by id number from the HashMap.

      Returns the set of all customer ids currently in the HashMap.
      void getCustomers()
      This method sends a SELECT query to the database to retrieve customers and then adds them to the HashMap.
      int getCustomerToEdit()
      When the edit button is pressed on the CustomerView, the controller passes the customer to edit to this DAO, indicating the customer that will undergo editing...this method returns that customer number.

      When the edit button is pressed on the CustomerView, the controller passes the customer to edit to this DAO, indicating the customer that will undergo editing...this method sets that customer number.

      This method sends an UPDATE query to the database to update the customer with customerId number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerDAOImp

        public CustomerDAOImp()
        The constructor for the CustomerDAO. Initializes the HashMap and then sends a SELECT query to retrieve customers from the database.

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomerToMap

        public void addCustomerToMap​(int customerId,
                             String name,
                             String address,
                             String postalCode,
                             String phone,
                             String createdBy,
                             String lastUpdatedBy,
                             int divisionId)
        This method adds a customer to the HashMap.
        Specified by:
        addCustomerToMap in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        customerId - The customer's id.
        name - The String with the customer's name.
        address - The String with the customer's address.
        postalCode - The String with the customer's postal code.
        phone - The String with the customer's phone number.
        createdBy - The String with the customer's creator.
        lastUpdatedBy - The String with the customer's last user to update.
        divisionId - The customer's location as a division id.

      • addCustomerToDatabase

        public void addCustomerToDatabase​(String name,
                                  String address,
                                  String postalCode,
                                  String phone,
                                  String divisionName)
        This method is used when the user adds a new customer using the CustomerEditView. It performs an INSERT INTO to add a new customer.
        Specified by:
        addCustomerToDatabase in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        name - The String with the customer's name.
        address - The String with the customer's address.
        postalCode - The String with the customer's postal code.
        phone - The String with the customer's phone number.
        divisionName - The customer's location as a division id.

        This query deletes a customer from the database using a DELETE FROM.
        Specified by:
        deleteCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        customerId - The id of the customer to delete.

        This method sends a SELECT query to the database to retrieve customers and then adds them to the HashMap.

      • updateCustomer

        public void updateCustomer​(int customerId,
                           String name,
                           String address,
                           String postalCode,
                           String phone,
                           String divisionName)
        This method sends an UPDATE query to the database to update the customer with customerId number.
        Specified by:
        updateCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        customerId - The id of the customer to update.
        name - The String with customer's name.
        address - The String with the customer's address.
        postalCode - The String with the customer's postal code.
        phone - The String with the customer's phone number.
        divisionName - The customer's location as a division id number.

      • getCustomerToEdit

        public int getCustomerToEdit()
        When the edit button is pressed on the CustomerView, the controller passes the customer to edit to this DAO, indicating the customer that will undergo editing...this method returns that customer number.
        Returns:
        The id of the customer to edit.

      • setCustomerToEdit

        public void setCustomerToEdit​(int custToEdit)
        When the edit button is pressed on the CustomerView, the controller passes the customer to edit to this DAO, indicating the customer that will undergo editing...this method sets that customer number.
        Parameters:
        custToEdit - The id of the customer to edit.

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer​(int custNumber)
        This method returns a customer by id number from the HashMap.
        Parameters:
        custNumber - The id of the customer.
        Returns:
        The Customer to return.

      • getCustomerKeys

        public Set<Integer> getCustomerKeys()
        Returns the set of all customer ids currently in the HashMap. This is typically used in conjunction with getCustomer(int) to iterate over the HashMap.
        Returns:
        The Set containing the customer ids.
